verses.roman:
rāghava-paṇḍita, āra ācārya nandana
kateka kahiba āra yata prabhura gaṇa

synonyms: rāghava-paṇḍita—Rāghava Paṇḍita; āra—and; ācārya nandana—the son of Advaita Ācārya; kateka—how many; kahiba—shall I describe; āra—other; yata—all; prabhura gaṇa—associates of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: Rāghava Paṇḍita, the son of Advaita Ācārya and all the devotees became very much satisfied. How many can I describe?
